name: Finobe 2011 (Working)
description:
UPDATE: You'll probably have to install this as a userscript now for it to work. 

Note that this is still a work in progress, but it's usable so I'm publishing it anyway. It will be improved and will become more accurate in time.
additional_info: At the moment, this should only be used with the light theme.
